column1: I love anime, poetry, JtHM, YouTube, and satire. Lowest grade (in a core subject) is 100 and highest is 117. I take all advanced/college level classes (in HS) and speak multiple languages, even though I'm too shy to talk usually. About to go on my first date ever with a guy from my d&d group.
love life too much, deployed, and can't shoot a gun to save my life.
Girlfriend of 1 year and a half broke up with me, Do your worst.
My boy Donny says he has high self esteem. Let's fix that.
Friend thinks hes a smartest in the school, Roast him!
My friend buys Dasani water bottles just for the cap codes. Roast him!
This time I was seriously just too lazy to mirror the photo so do your worst haha you guys seemed to have fun last time and I got a good laugh out of it 🤘🏼 #roastme
